title: First Screening: Computer Poems
brief_description: A suite of a dozen kinetic poems programmed in Apple BASIC. Later, as the first versions became inaccessible, the works were recreated in HyperCard in the early 1990s (after bpNichol’s death), and then in 2007 recreated in javascript for the web, and simultaneously the original BASIC and Hypercard files were republished for download.

constellations_other.name: Pen names, poems and puppets
constellations_other.description: Discover how big-screen adaptations of novels connect to web-based poetry and Jim Henson's Fraggle Rock.
